relation: A string representing the name of the connection to the Deployer.
The name of a connection to the Deployer.
textBeforeTable: Table A-26 describeApplianceInstances options Table A-26 shows the command options for describeApplianceInstances. A.1.26.3 Options Describes one or more deployed instances of an assembly. A.1.26.2 Description $ abctl describeApplianceInstances [-assemblyInstanceId String...] [-applianceInstanceId String...] [-applianceIndex String...] -connectionName String  A.1.26.1 Synopsis     Details for this command follow. A.1.26 describeApplianceInstances      $ abctl deployAssemblyInstance -assemblyInstanceId MyId  A.1.25.4.1 Deploying an Assembly Instance     Here are some command examples. A.1.25.4 Examples           Specifies the amount of time to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete successfully.   A string representing the number of seconds.   5   false   pt   -pollTime     Specifies whether to wait for an asynchronous operation
textAfterTable: A.1.26.4 Examples Here are some command examples. A.1.26.4.1 Describe Appliance Instances  $ abctl describeApplianceInstances A.1.27 describeAssemblyArchives Details for this command follow. A.1.27.1 Synopsis  $ abctl describeAssemblyArchives [-assembly String...] -connectionName String A.1.27.2 Description Describes one or more assemblies in the Deployer. A.1.27.3 Options Table A-27 shows the command options for describeAssemblyArchives. Table A-27 describeAssemblyArchives options Name Alias Req'd Default Values Possible Values Description -assembly a false none A list of the assemblies to describe. Specifies the assemblies to describe.
